channel.title: Cant report people
channel.description:
#### What happened? Almost always when I report someone, gives error "player not found"
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? To get the green icon saying the report was received
#### Steps to reproduce: End game, select a player using the "report scroll icon" Write what they did in the dialog. Click report button from the dialog. Scroll icon button gets a red cross Mouseover says "Player not found"
#### Comments:

item.title: Cant report people
item.dc:creator: Jaliborc
item.description:
What happened?

Almost always when I report someone, gives error “player not found”

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

To get the green icon saying the report was received

Steps to reproduce:

End game, select a player using the “report scroll icon”
Write what they did in the dialog.
Click report button from the dialog.
Scroll icon button gets a red cross
Mouseover says “Player not found”

Comments:

Read full topic
